dc_title_s: Soil map: Indiana, Starke County sheet
dc_description_s: Relief shown by contours. Shows distribution of soil types by colors and symbols. In lower margin: A. Hoen & Co. Baltimore, Md. Scale approximately 1:63,360. 1 inch = 1 mile. U.S. Dept. of Agriculture, Bureau of Soils [and] State of Indiana Department of Geology; soils surveyed by E.J. Grimes [and others].
